entry.title: Baccata/smithy4s-deriving
entry.summary:
smithy4s-deriving

This is a proof of concept for an alternative way to code-generators of interacting with Smithy4s, using typeclass derivation.

The goals are :

  • Scala 3 only
  • derivation of smithy4s.schema.Schema for scala 3 case classes and enums (including recursive ones)
  • derivation of a smithy4s.Service-adjacent construct for monomorphic traits/classes (for different "effects", including direct-style interfaces), allowing to use the existing routers/clients implementations without any change in the upstream library
  • support for hints reflecting smithy-traits on types/fields/methods/method parameters by means of a @Smithy annotation

NB

In its current state, this is not a library, this is just code. It may make its way to Smithy4s once the feature it uses reach a Scala 3 LTS version, or I may decide to publish it as a side-library in other repo.

Inspiration

  • Jamie Thompson's https://github.com/bishabosha/ops-mirror
  • Jakub Kozlowski's https://github.com/polyvariant/respectfully/
